author: Bobloy
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Audio trivia!
 You **MUST** unload trivia to use this (`[p]unload trivia`)
 Then you can get started with `[p]load audiotrivia` and `[p]help AudioTrivia`
end_user_data_statement:
This cog expands the core Audio and Trivia cogs without collecting any additional End User Data.
See the core End User Data storage for more information
